name: Mastermind (Elcomp Publishing)
overview: A mastermind strategy board game published in the book "29 Programs for the Commodore 64/264". This was also released a year later in Germany under the name Mamco, and published by Ing. W. Hofacker GmbH in the German translation of the same book, which was titled. "Mehr als 29 Programme für den Commodore 64".
